OK, I've been able to reproduce this bug.  Simply by double clicking repeatedly on a StyledText throws this NPE.  Sometimes is happens after a few clicks, sometimes it happens after 100 double clicks.  Myself and all my co-workers have been able to reproduce this simply by double-clicking on a word in a styled text.

Another scenario that might pin it down a little is simply by double clicking on a work to highlight it, then just move your mouse.  Pow.

The setDoubleClickEnabled flag doesn't seem to change anything.  I would suspect that if this were false it would not allow one to select/highlight a word on a double-click.  There appears to be scenarios with double clicking and and mouse movement (at the same time) allows a word to be selected, followed by a NPE.
Actually it only appears to happen when the setDoubleClickEnabled is false.
